definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: It was designed by Master Monk Xuanzang of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 是唐代的玄奘大師親自設計的。

sentences.english: "Then give it all up", said the Master cheerfully.
sentences.chinese: “那就都別做吧，”大師高高興興地說。

sentences.english: We must embalm the master's wise opinions.
sentences.chinese: 這位大師的崇論閎議，我們一定要銘記於心。

sentences.english: Leo's also have the potential to become musical maestros .
sentences.chinese: 獅子座也有可能成爲音樂大師。

sentences.english: Snagging a great, creative new job.
sentences.chinese: 粗磨一個大師，有創造力的新工作。

sentences.english: Cultivating academicians mainly depends on the most famous university, scientific research institution and the great masters.
sentences.chinese: 培養院士主要靠最著名的大學和科研機構，靠大師。

sentences.english: I don't understand what Master Oogway was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白烏龜大師在想什麼。

sentences.english: The latest 4- hanky love story by the master of sweet, heartwarming romantic tales.
sentences.chinese: 純愛小說大師的最新愛情催淚彈。

sentences.english: Now you understand the story about Master Monk Xuanzang and why the Dayan Pagoda was built?
sentences.chinese: 這下你瞭解了玄奘大師的故事和大雁塔的來歷了吧？

sentences.english: They are the perfect masters of disguise; wearing masks of calm and collected beings.
sentences.chinese: 他們是僞裝大師，頭戴一副冷靜的面具收集信息。

sentences.english: Master Demonologist (Felhunter) will now also reduce damage taken by Holy.
sentences.chinese: 惡魔學識大師現在也能減免神聖傷害。

sentences.english: Plate armour is called a "harness", and it requires a Master Armourer to make and fit it to a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 板甲又名全身甲，需要盔甲大師爲士兵度身定造。

sentences.english: Er-hu virtuosi can play even the most complex violin pieces with two strings.
sentences.chinese: 二胡大師能用兩根弦拉最複雜的小提琴曲。

sentences.english: Small qian to block has angered the master yoda, more is out of the clear temple.
sentences.chinese: 小倩欲阻止卻惹怒了尤達大師，更被趕出導明寺。

sentences.english: Li Yu was a drama master of the transitional period of the Ming Dynasty and Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李玉是晚明至清初的戲曲大師。

sentences.english: Today we shingl study the text first: then I'll ask you a few pre-determined questions.
sentences.chinese: 而今大師先看課文，然後我問幾個問題。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
huge/great/grand/worthy of the greatest admiration/important (contribution etc)
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
